Basics.When adding Rythm I can't see my server:
You need to have a role with “Administrator” or “Manage server” permissions to be able to add a Bot (Rythm) to a Discord Server.

If you have the right permissions and still can’t see your server in the list, make sure you’re logged in into the correct discord account in your web browser.
Basics.Rythm left the voice channel after 2 min:
For performance reasons, Rythm leaves after 2 minutes of it being alone in a voice channel.
This helps Rhythm save resources while no one is listening to it and keeps the music quality
consistent for all users at any given time!

Don't worry though, as long as you are in a voice channel, just type !summon to make Rythm join your channel!
Basics.Rythm messages come out blank:
Rythm uses something called rich embeds for the messages, which is an option that might be disabled on your client. Make sure to enable it!

To do so:

Go to your discord settings > click on "Text & Images" > Enable "Show website preview info from links pasted into chat” .
